iisValueBrowser Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
SpecialValueListA list representing special values of an item
SValueStruct SValue holds a value as QVariant and its flags
TBaseGroupRepresentsgroup items (i.e. non-editable group separators)
TBaseItemA base class for Value Browser items. Should not be used directly
TBaseListValueRepresents abstract value item with list support. Should not be used directly
TBaseValueA base class for items which provide editable values. Internally it provides support of simple QVariant-based value and all the facilities for drawing, editing, validating, storing and reading
TColorListA common list of color values
TColorValidatorA validator for color values
TColorValueA color value class which allows to store color values as QColor
TDoubleValidatorA validator for double values
TFontListA common list of font values
TFontValueA color value class which allows to store color values as QFont
TIntValidatorA validator for integer values
TItemA common item representing one item in drop-down list of value editor
TItemListA common list of TItem items
TListValueRepresents common value item with list support. May be used directly with TItemList class as drop-down list of items, or may be subclassed in order to build own list-based values
TPathValueFile path input
TPointValidatorA validator for QPoint values
TPointValueA point value class which allows to work with QPoint values
TRangeValidatorA validator for Range values
TRangeValueA range value class
TRectValidatorA validator for QRect values
TRectValueA rectangular value class which allows to work with QRect values
TRegExpValidatorA validator for string values
TSizeValidatorA validator for QSize values
TSizeValueA size value class which allows to work with QSize values
TTextValueMultiline text input
TValueBrowserValue Browser widget
TValueItemDelegateDelegate for drawing an item. May be reimplemented in child classes (but usually shouldn't)
TValueValidatorAbstract class which is used as the base for all value validators
